message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can reach a more reasonable price. I am willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer.  While $9,500 is a fair price, I'm looking for something closer to $11,000 to reflect the true value of this product. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Hello Alice, I understand your perspective, but I believe I should only pay $10,000 for this product. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to my offer.
